name: Use at least one of each weapon's Ex
Beat Hilda without killing any minions
Defeat all King Dice's minions in a single gauntlet
Don't use either Lobber or Roundabout
Beat The Bee without Pressing Down
Get all 3 Slot combinations in Ribby n Croaks
S rank any plane level with Machine gun Only
Collect at least 1 S on each of 3 Isles
Beat Train without parrying the wheels on the cart
Hit the Start Over at King Dice
Defeat King Dice without any hearts
Dodge Werner Werman charge attack with no springs
